backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage mixins, access control, payment config, and data models for users, membership, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and Stripe integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated sidebar navigation styling and related frontend files, components, and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of multiple frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes, including sidebar‑specific variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML wrapper loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller managing identity, backend actor readiness, profile loading, routing, and startup error handling.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI card displaying an access‑denied message with an optional back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Card component rendering detailed deal analysis data including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating badge.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell managing navigation, page rendering, mobile menu behavior, and logout, with lazy‑loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary component that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with reset handling.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a buyer’s summary info including contact, budget, and preferred areas with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting buyers, including form state management and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Lists contracts for a deal with loading, error, empty states, status badges, and download actions.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Form to upload contract files with validation, progress tracking, and backend upload integration.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows a deal summary with address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit plus an edit option.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting deals with fields for seller info, pricing, stage, buyer assignment, and profit values.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked-feature card prompting users to upgrade their membership tier.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Renders a bar chart summarizing the last six months of profit and estimated fees based on deal data.
frontend/src/components/OpaqueOverlays.t: Provides wrapper components that enforce opaque backgrounds for dialog, sheet, and select content.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Shows an error state for failed page queries with retry and optional support/contact actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: First‑time user profile setup dialog that initializes permissions and saves basic profile info.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Table displaying total profit aggregated by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding and value‑prop sections.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a startup error with stage info, diagnostic hints, retry, sign-out, and contact-support actions.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Shows a branded loading screen with spinner and optional message during app startup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds a backend actor with identity-awareness, optional admin initialization, and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and persisted identities via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Provides a hook for media‑query matching and a helper for mobile detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data, including profile loading with timeouts and normalized error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark themes, component styling, and custom sidebar and chart color variables.
frontend/src/lib/authErrors.ts: Provides helpers to classify auth, timeout, and network errors and generate user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Defines centralized UI copy for navigation labels, error messages, empty states, locked features, admin text, and support text.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Implements MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fee calculations for deals.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Contains membership tier access checks and utilities including deal limits and locked-feature messaging.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats bigint cents to USD strings and parses USD strings back into bigint cents.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Provides support email constant and functions to open or generate mailto support links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app in the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing membership pricing, granting tiers, and configuring Stripe settings.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays enterprise-only analytics with metrics, error handling, and a profit-by-zip table.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Shows and manages the buyer list with Pro/Enterprise gating, loading states, error handling, and buyer editing dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only contracts manager allowing users to select deals, upload contracts, and view contract lists with robust error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays deal metrics, charts, and membership info using fetched deals and user profile, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Provides an AI-powered deal analyzer with form input, analysis results, and the ability to create a new deal from the analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Shows all deals organized by stage, supports creating/editing deals, and enforces membership limits on active deals.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership tiers, pricing options, and triggers Stripe checkout sessions for upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs users of canceled payments, shows session details, and provides navigation back to membership or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Validates a successful payment session, confirms membership activation, and offers navigation to dashboard or membership plans.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and theme extensions, plus plugin integration.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and configuration info.
